price: Wakasema: Sisi tumeagua kuwa nyinyi ni wakorofi. Ikiwa hamtaacha basi kwa yakini tutakupigeni mawe, na mtapata adhabu chungu kutoka kwetu.
arabic: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا تَطَيَّرۡنَا بِكُمۡۖ لَئِن لَّمۡ تَنتَهُواْ لَنَرۡجُمَنَّكُمۡ وَلَيَمَسَّنَّكُم مِّنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ
footnotes: Wana mji wale wakasema: Sisi tunaona kuwa nyinyi mnatuletea ukorofi. Na tunaapa, lau kuwa hamsiti na huo wito wenu hapana shaka tutakupopoeni kwa mawe, na hapana shaka mtapata kwetu adhabu kali yenye kutia uchungu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qālū innā taṭayyarnā bikum la-in lam tantahū lanarjumannakum walayamassannakum minnā ʿadhābun alīmun
